titles.title: U.S. Postal Service Accountability and Voting Rights Act
U.S. Postal Service Accountability and Voting Rights Act
U.S. Postal Service Accountability and Voting Rights Act
To protect and promote the ability of members of the Armed Forces and citizens to vote by mail, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Reform, and in addition to the Committees on House Administration, and Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
